channel.title: DDZ pkz! Something new
channel.description:
Hello, and welcome to my project. i already started this 2 months ago so i got somewhere already!
This will be a custom server! not as in custom items but as in custom and entertaining content! I will also do requests on content!
[font=georgia][b]Features:[/b][/font]
[b][size=12pt]Skills:[/size][/b] [b]Magic: 100% Fishing: 100% (including animation rework) Slayer: 100% (with a custom quest connected to it) Farming: 0% Mining: 45% Cooking: 90% Prayer: 100% (including 1 custom prayer and piety) Rune crafting: 80% Agility: 20% Thieving: 40% (only added stalls yet) Herblore: 100% (it's a bit custom style) Crafting: 100% Woodcutting: 100% Firemaking: 0% Smithing: 85% Ranging: 100% Fletching: 100%[/b]
[b]Quests:[/b]
[b]The Family - 100% -Access to the slayer skill -And needed for a future quest
Rune Mysteries - 100% -Access to the skill rune crafting -Access to both the essence mine + the abyss
Lost City - 100% -Ability to use Dragon long + dagger -Access to Zanaris
Desert Treasure - 100% -Ability to switch to and from ancient magic -And wearing ghostly robes (you will need to find them with the ring of visibility)
Lunar diplomacy - 100% -Ability to use lunar magic -And wearing moonclan robes and lunar armor
Dragon Slayer - 85% -Ability to wear rune plate bodies -People will know you as the guy who has slain elvarg the dragon)
Bleed from the inside - 83% -Access to the demon king -Requirement for the quest No way
No way - 14% -Ability to change into a demon -Requirement for the quest Not again...
Not again... - 0% -Access to the demon sanctuary [/b]
[b]Minigames:[/b]
[b]Pest control - 100% with clipped npc's, sounds, new interface, and awesome rewards
Zombie madness - 85% Rewards include zombie clothing and peanace armor.
Capture the captain - 100% (yes the idea was from some other server but i liked it) Rewards include defenders and various types of uncommon armor
Duel arena 100% - Fight your friends and stake money or items!
No guts no glory! 10% - Bring a stone to the end of a dungeon without dieing! YOU CANT TAKE FOOD! [/b] [b]Bosses:[/b]
[b]King black dragon 100% - Fight a dragon of the size of a building! Beware it can freeze stun and poison you!
Kalphite queen 100% - A huge mutated insect that eats fresh meat! YOU! It also know's the art of prayer and protects from various combat styles! Beware you don't finish her off that easily.
Demon king 100% - The king of Demons angry and aggressive! Beware he spits fire and has 2 of his minions ready to take you on![/b]
Only 3 bosses yet :/ suggest some more! (not that godwars crap thats gay)
[size=14pt][b][font=georgia]Misc:[/font][/b][/size]
[font=arial][b]Sounds Music Pets Hp orb Prayer orb Run orb (works flawless) Items kept on death Equipment interface New emotes interface Clan chat Bank pins Wilderness ditch[/b][/font]
Some pictures: [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/bankpin.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/ditch-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/dragonslayer.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/fishing.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/random.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/random2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/withoutammy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/withammy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/random4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/random3.png[/img]
Post feedback and idea's below! Thank you for your time reading this!

item.title: DDZ pkz! Something new
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Good.
Ways to improve:-

  1. Bank Pin interface is sexy but you need to space out the numbers.
  2. Having swearing in your server reduces your reputation against other servers.
  3. Have no quest to start slayer

Read full topic

item.title: DDZ pkz! Something new
item.dc:creator: @nwe_luigi2 nwe luigi2
item.description:
@nwe_luigi2 wrote:

Hello, and welcome to my project. i already started this 2 months ago so i got somewhere already!

This will be a custom server! not as in custom items but as in custom and entertaining content! I will also do requests on content!

[font=georgia]Features:[/font]

[size=12pt]Skills:[/size]
Magic: 100%
Fishing: 100% (including animation rework)
Slayer: 100% (with a custom quest connected to it)
Farming: 0%
Mining: 45%
Cooking: 90%
Prayer: 100% (including 1 custom prayer and piety)
Rune crafting: 80%
Agility: 20%
Thieving: 40% (only added stalls yet)
Herblore: 100% (it’s a bit custom style)
Crafting: 100%
Woodcutting: 100%
Firemaking: 0%
Smithing: 85%
Ranging: 100%
Fletching: 100%

Quests:

[b]The Family - 100%
-Access to the slayer skill
-And needed for a future quest

Rune Mysteries - 100%
-Access to the skill rune crafting
-Access to both the essence mine + the abyss

Lost City - 100%
-Ability to use Dragon long + dagger
-Access to Zanaris

Desert Treasure - 100%
-Ability to switch to and from ancient magic
-And wearing ghostly robes (you will need to find them with the ring of visibility)

Lunar diplomacy - 100%
-Ability to use lunar magic
-And wearing moonclan robes and lunar armor

Dragon Slayer - 85%
-Ability to wear rune plate bodies
-People will know you as the guy who has slain elvarg the dragon)

Bleed from the inside - 83%
-Access to the demon king
-Requirement for the quest No way

No way - 14%
-Ability to change into a demon
-Requirement for the quest Not again…

Not again… - 0%
-Access to the demon sanctuary [/b]

Minigames:

[b]Pest control - 100% with clipped npc’s, sounds, new interface, and awesome rewards

Zombie madness - 85% Rewards include zombie clothing and peanace armor.

Capture the captain - 100% (yes the idea was from some other server but i liked it) Rewards include defenders and various types of uncommon armor

Duel arena 100% - Fight your friends and stake money or items!

No guts no glory! 10% - Bring a stone to the end of a dungeon without dieing! YOU CANT TAKE FOOD!
[/b]
Bosses:

[b]King black dragon 100% - Fight a dragon of the size of a building! Beware it can freeze stun and poison you!

Kalphite queen 100% - A huge mutated insect that eats fresh meat! YOU! It also know’s the art of prayer and protects from various combat styles! Beware you don’t finish her off that easily.

Demon king 100% - The king of Demons angry and aggressive! Beware he spits fire and has 2 of his minions ready to take you on![/b]

Only 3 bosses yet suggest some more! (not that godwars crap thats gay)

Music
